quotes: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
The journey, not the destination matters.
Change yourself - you are in control.
Every drop in the ocean counts.
It's easy to wish for health when you're sick.  When you're doing well, you need just as much vigilance.
You can start changing our world for the better daily, no matter how small the action.
Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.
Focused, hard work is the real key to success.
You cannot always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside.
The right thing to do and the hard thing to do are usually the same.
Most people dabble their way through life, never deciding to master anything in particular.
Wheels of justice grind slow but grind fine.
Talk to someone about themselves and they'll listen for hours.
They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.
The significance of life is living.
You'll see it when you believe it.
Real learning comes about when the competitive spirit has ceased.
It's the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
The world only exists in your eyes. You can make it as big or as small as you want.
We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.
Life and death are of supreme importance. Time swiftly passes by and opportunity is lost.
The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people.
Be strong. Be confident. Be the star of your own life.
it's important to make sure that we're talking with each other in a way that heals, not in a way that wounds.
Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
It is easy to love your friend, but sometimes the hardest lesson to learn is to love your enemy.
Care about what other people think and you will always be their prisoner.
The only man who never makes mistakes is the man who never does anything.
The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.
For changes to be of any true value, they've got to be lasting and consistent.
Don't Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.
Your home is where your thoughts find peace.
A liar knows that he is a liar, but one who speaks mere portions of truth in order to deceive is a craftsman of destruction.
It is children only who enjoy the present; their elders either live on the memory of the past or the hope of the future.
Life is like underwear, should be changed twice a day.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
The friendship that can cease has never been real.
Confidence is contagious. So is lack of confidence.
Greatest success comes just one step beyond the point at which defeat overtakes you.
Friends ask you questions; enemies question you.
With self-discipline, almost anything is possible.
If you do not get the chills when you set your goal you're not setting big enough goals.
Study logic and math, because once you've mastered them, you won't fear any book.
If ever you feel like an animal among men, be a lion.
When one door closes another door opens.
It's beautiful to be alone. To be alone does not mean to be lonely. It means the mind is not influenced and contaminated by society.
Be careful the environment you choose for it will shape you; be careful the friends you choose for you will become like them.
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!'
